member.name: DISK_GROW_PARTITION
member.summary: Contains information used to increase the size of a partition.This structure is used by the IOCTL_DISK_GROW_PARTITION control code.

member.name: DISK_GROW_PARTITION.PartitionNumber
member.summary: The identifier of the partition to be enlarged.

member.name: DISK_GROW_PARTITION.BytesToGrow
member.summary: The number of bytes by which the partition is to be enlarged (positive value) or reduced (negative value). Note that this value is not the new size of the partition.
